commit_types.style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code
commit_types.refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
commit_types.perf: A code change that improves performance
commit_types.test: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
commit_types.build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies
commit_types.ci: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts
commit_types.chore: Other changes that don't modify src or test files

draft.scope_description: Specify which package/app is affected by this change. Use the appropriate scope from the monorepo structure.
